Articles.Content:
No Ratvi, not this side of the 1.0 release, and possibly never, as trying to reconcile multiplayer with the time warp system is just too big a problem, which you'd know if you had searched for multiplayer before asking

This subject has been discussed to death, shocked back to life with lightening, killed by villagers with pitchforks and buried in several unmarked graves already, so this thread will now be closed.

No. At least, not until the game has been finished and released: they might develop a multiplayer version once that has been done.

EDIT: Ninja-ed!
